data.lyric:
[ti:The Christmas Song (Merry Christmas To You)]
[ar:Nat King Cole]
[al:XMAS HITS]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]The Christmas Song(Merry Christmas To You) (2019 Remastered) - Nat King Cole
[00:07.01]Written by：Mel Tormé/Robert Wells
[00:14.03]Chestnuts roasting
[00:16.20]On an open fire
[00:18.75]
[00:21.05]Jack Frost nipping
[00:22.83]At your nose
[00:25.27]
[00:27.98]Yuletide carols being sung
[00:31.46]By a choir
[00:33.48]
[00:34.50]And folks dressed up like Eskimos
[00:39.19]
[00:40.18]Everybody knows a turkey
[00:43.84]And some mistletoe
[00:47.45]
[00:49.07]Help to make the season bright
[00:53.59]
[00:56.19]Tiny tots with their eyes
[00:59.36]All aglow
[01:00.86]
[01:01.58]We'll find it hard to sleep tonight
[01:07.32]
[01:08.26]They know that Santa's
[01:12.23]On his way
[01:14.05]
[01:15.37]He's loaded lots of toys
[01:17.66]And goodies on his sleigh
[01:20.53]
[01:21.78]And every mother's child
[01:24.87]
[01:25.49]Is gonna spy
[01:27.51]
[01:28.38]To see if reindeer really
[01:31.58]Know how to fly
[01:34.69]
[01:35.64]And so I'm offering
[01:39.11]
[01:39.79]This simple phrase
[01:42.49]
[01:44.00]To kids from one to ninety two
[01:48.25]
[01:50.26]Although it's been said
[01:52.52]
[01:53.44]Many times many ways
[01:56.06]Merry Christmas to you
[02:01.55]
[02:30.54]And so I'm offering
[02:35.14]This simple phrase
[02:37.90]
[02:39.38]To kids from one to ninety two
[02:44.50]
[02:46.15]Although it's been said
[02:48.40]
[02:49.41]Many times many ways
[02:52.21]Merry Christmas to you
